name: NSDragOperation
desc: These constants are used by draggingSourceOperationMask.

items.name: static var copy: NSDragOperation
items.desc: The data represented by the image can be copied.

items.name: static var generic: NSDragOperation
items.desc: The operation can be defined by the destination.

items.name: static var `private`: NSDragOperation
items.desc: The operation is negotiated privately between the source and the destination.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.
